categoryFilter.description: The filter string to match categories. Categories are delimited by / if they are hierarchical. The filter supports globs.

connectionFilter.description: The filter string to match connection names. Connection names are delimited by / if they are hierarchical. The filter supports globs.

typeFilter.description: The filter string to connection types. Every unique type of connection like SSH or docker has its own type identifier that you can match. The filter supports globs.
